thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Mark williams
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Mark williams

author: Mark williams
title: Mark williams
text: I have been buying items from Banggood for a couple of years, and always found that the products match what is advertised. It is also is good to go to a site where you can buy a wide range of products from a single supplier that I can have confidence in. Recently, some orders failed to arrive - over the Christmas rush - and Banggood very generously offered to re-send or refund. I have found that few suppliers will do this for you. Well done Banggood!
